sourceMeaningMnemonic: If you put two <radical>mustache</radical>s on either side of a <radical>tsunami</radical> it won't know which way to go and spin back and forth until it becomes a <kanji>whirlpool</kanji>. Mustaches are pretty gross, so I don't blame the tsunami for avoiding them.
meaningInfo: Picture the tsunami spinning in a circle, trying not to hit the mustaches until it spins itself into a giant whirlpool.
readingMnemonic: The <kanji>whirlpool</kanji> is huge, and it starts pulling things into itself. Oh no, is that my <reading>ca</reading>r (<ja>か</ja>)? Hey, wait! Whirlpool give my car back!
readingInfo: Picture my car getting sucked into the whirlpool. Picture me crying as my car disappears into it forever.
